sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.synopsis: <!ELEMENT variable (#PCDATA)> <!ATTLIST variable name CDATA #REQUIRED mode CDATA #IMPLIED>
sect2.para: This element occurs in the element environment.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element variable allows to add a variable definition to the environment.
The name of the variable is given by the attribute name of the element.
The attribute mode can take the value "append", in which case the content of the element is appended to the value of the environment variable
The value of the variable is given by the textual content of the element.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.programlisting:
echo Stage
export GCCFLAGS=-O2 export PATH=${PATH}:/opt/foo echo Executing configure cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a ./configure
echo Executing make cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a make
echo Executing make cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a make install
echo Exiting stage
